name: tmpl_ipoa
description: Template for Information Platform Open Access and Open Journal Systems
author: Sibylle NÃ¤gle

scripts.createDistCss: ./node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style compressed Resources/Private/Scss/style.scss Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css; ./node_modules/.bin/postcss --use autoprefixer --no-map -b 'last 2 versions' Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css -o Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css
scripts.createDevCss: ./node_modules/.bin/node-sass --source-map true Resources/Private/Scss/style.scss Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css; ./node_modules/.bin/postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css -o Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css
scripts.buildAll: ./node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style compressed Resources/Private/Scss/style.scss Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css; ./node_modules/.bin/postcss --use autoprefixer --no-map -b 'last 2 versions' Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css -o Resources/Public/Css/ipoa.css
scripts.devAll: npm run lintJs && npm run createDevCss && node build.js && npm run babel && cp ./Build/JavaScript/ipoa.js ./Resources/Public/JavaScript/
